snippet.title: VERTIGO Official Release Trailer
snippet.description:
It's finally almost here. Vertigo, the story-based exploration game, is pushing the frontier of Virtual Reality forward.
Fantastic trailer music provided under Creative Commons Attribution by Melodysheep (http://www.youtube.com/user/melodysheep)
More information at http://www.zulubo.com/vertigo
Get the free demo here:http://store.steampowered.com/app/465430
